jewels.name: BaubleBar Cassarah Beaded Multistrand Necklace
jewels.description: Strand upon strand of lustrous beads spotlight your face and neckline in this gorgeous statement necklace.

jewels.name: Simple Obsession Diamond Pendant Necklace
jewels.description: A dazzling lenticular pendant set with 16 sparkling diamonds distinguishes a handcrafted statement necklace in 18-karat gold.

jewels.name: Petal Chiffon Statement Earrings
jewels.description: Fluttery chiffon petals surround a pair of gorgeous, elegant statement earrings fashioned with tiny crystals for a hint of shine.

jewels.name: Kirsten Drop Earrings
jewels.description: Perfect for day or night, these diamond-shaped drop earrings put an eye-catching touch on any ensemble.

jewels.name: Lilith Cuff
jewels.description: A pair of irregularly shaped stones adds organic interest to this signature brushed-metal cuff.

jewels.name: Aviva Diamond Bar Slider Bracelet
jewels.description: Handcrafted bar stations dotted with 42 pavé diamonds sparkle along this lovely 18-karat-gold bracelet that has a dainty, adjustable-length chain.

jewels.name: Fiji Bar Friendship Diamond Chain Ring
jewels.description: A slim bar alight in diamond pavé centers a clever ring that has an adjustable chain so you can wear the style on any finger you like.

jewels.name: Siren Medium Semiprecious Stone Stacking Ring
jewels.description: Set in an organically formed vermeil setting, a beautiful rose-cut semiprecious stone takes center stage in a slender ring that easily stacks with other bands.

jewels.name: Pavé Diamond Round Engagement Ring Setting
jewels.description: Pavé diamonds—18 in all—add brilliant shine to the band of a handcrafted white-gold semi-mount ring topped by a four-prong solitaire setting.

jewels.name: Baroque Keshi Pearl Ring
jewels.description: Nature's own handiwork is transformed into an elegant fashion accent via this cocktail ring showcasing a lustrous keshi pearl in a striking organic shape.
